senselogic.sitevision.api.security.jaas.callback

Class UserPrincipalCallback

  • Object
    • senselogic.sitevision.api.security.jaas.callback.UserPrincipalCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callback

    public class UserPrincipalCallback
extends Object
implements Callback

    JAAS callback for mapping usernames to Principals. The Principal will be a User object in the Sitevision model.

    Important legacy note! As of Sitevision 3 this class has been moved (from package senselogic.sitevision.security.jaas.callback.api). Previously implemented custom JAAS filters/modules using this class must be re-compiled in order to run in Sitevision 3.
    Author:
    Rickard Ã–berg

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserPrincipalCallback(String aName)
      Create a callback that provides the username of the user to be looked up and converted into a Principal.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Gets the username of the principal to be found.
        Returns:
        username

      • getPrincipal

        public Principal getPrincipal()
        Get principal that corresponds to the given username.
        Returns:
        the first user principal in the directory with the given name, and null if no such user is found.

      • setPrincipal

        public void setPrincipal(Principal aPrincipal)
        Sets the principal that corresponds to the given username.
        Parameters:
        aPrincipal - a user principal

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
